New Records: Darius Garland scored 25 points, extending his streak of high-scoring games.
Jarrett Allen recorded 19 points and 11 rebounds, showcasing his all-around ability.
Key Match Events: The Cavaliers secured their 10th consecutive win, highlighting their current dominance in the league.
Pre-Game Insights: The Cavaliers were heavily favored to win, based on their impressive 31-4 record and strong home performance.
Post-Match Reflections: The Cavaliers' victory was seen as a crucial step in their quest for the championship, given their strong record and momentum.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was held at Rocket Mortgage FieldHouse in Cleveland, Ohio, with a crowd of 19,432 fans in attendance.
Others: This was the third meeting in the regular-season series between the Cavaliers and Hornets, with the Cavaliers leading 3-0.
